name: Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS)
description: Ensures organic status from raw materials to manufacturing, guaranteeing organic fibers and strict criteria for processing and labor conditions.

name: Fairtrade
description: Focuses on fair wages, ethical treatment of workers, and community development.

name: OEKO-TEX Standard 100
description: Certifies textiles free from harmful substances, ensuring products are tested for health risks and emphasizing consumer safety.

name: Bluesign
description: Focuses on the environmental impact of textile production, ensuring resource efficiency, worker safety, and reduced environmental impact.

name: Cradle to Cradle (C2C)
description: Assesses products for environmental and social performance throughout their life cycle, encouraging continuous improvement and safe disposal.

name: B Corp Certification
description: Signifies high standards of social and environmental performance, balancing purpose and profit for positive impact.

name: PETA Approved Vegan
description: Certifies products without animal-derived materials, assuring consumers of ethical and cruelty-free practices.

name: Carbon Trust Standard
description: Recognizes organizations committed to reducing their carbon footprint, demonstrating a transparent commitment to sustainability.

name: Better Cotton Initiative
description: Promotes better standards in cotton farming with a focus on environmental and social sustainability.

name: Forest Stewardship Council (FSC)
description: Identifies responsibly sourced forest products, applicable to fabrics, clothing, footwear, packaging, and tags made from FSC-certified materials.

name: Climate Neutral
description: Focuses on reducing and offsetting carbon emissions in clothing production, contributing to a carbon-neutral industry.

name: SA8000 Standard
description: Audits and certifies clothing brands for adherence to international labor standards, ensuring ethical treatment of workers.

name: Responsible Wool Standard (RWS)
description: Ensures responsible practices in wool production, covering animal welfare, land management, and worker welfare.
